definition: palm (of one's hand)/control (extended meaning from having something in the palm of one's hand)
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
lit. both the palm and the back of the hand are made of flesh (idiom)/fig. to both be of equal importance/to value both equally
pinyin: shou3 xin1 shou3 bei4 dou1 shi4 rou4

sentences.english: Lie face down on the floor with your elbows bent and your palms next to your shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 臉朝地板向下，肘關節彎曲，手心靠近肩膀。

sentences.english: hold your hands about 8cm above the table, palms facing up
sentences.chinese: 伸出雙手，大概距離桌面上方8cm高處，手心朝上。

sentences.english: Rub each palm over the back of the other hand.
sentences.chinese: 手心對手背相互搓擦，交換進行。

sentences.english: Hold it in the palm or wear in front, it can have the same breath with you.
sentences.chinese: 握在手心或戴與胸前，就能與你氣息相通。

sentences.english: Slightly, the two are Taobuchu her my palm.
sentences.chinese: 略，讓她倆都逃不出我的手心。

sentences.english: B. Hold label against palm of hand while pouring.
sentences.chinese: 倒時就用手心貼住標籤。

sentences.english: All fatally the sweet fragrance given out by the bloody rosebush, as a nightmare, bloomed right in his palm .
sentences.chinese: 血薔薇腥甜的芬芳夢魘般致命地綻放在他手心。

sentences.english: Imagine what you'd do with a hot piece of coal in your hand.
sentences.chinese: 想像一下如果在你手心放下一塊燒紅的熱炭會怎麼辦？

sentences.english: The enemy cannot escape from our control.
sentences.chinese: 敵人逃不出我們的手心。
臉紅，臉頰發燙，手心出汗。

sentences.english: Infinite passes through many places the tender feelings, were pass over gently and swiftly control low light.
sentences.chinese: 無限宛轉的柔情，是掠過手心的一道微弱光線。

sentences.english: There was barely any breeze, and the humidity was so thick you could almost roll it in your palms.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一絲風，空氣潮溼得幾乎可以把它放在手心滾搓。

sentences.english: The poor stationer was at the mercy of those from whom he borrowed money.
sentences.chinese: 這可憐的文具商被他的債主們捏在了手心。

sentences.english: Though we are hundreds of miles apart, I can feel you squeeze my hand.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我倆遠隔千里，但我可以感受到你這緊握我手心。

sentences.english: The Monkey King cannot jump out of Buddha's palm.
sentences.chinese: 孫悟空跳不出如來佛的手心。

sentences.english: Thee enemy cannot escape from our control.
sentences.chinese: 敵人逃不出我們的手心。

definition: the five fingers of one's hand
pit of the stomach/solar plexus/words and thoughts
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
